summary: 2008 SNO PRO TRAILER MODEL 85X10DX PURCHASED AUG. 2008.  THE WHEEL BROKE OFF THE AXLE  ON THE HIGHWAY ON SMOOTH PAVEMENT.  THE TRAILER HAS ONLY BEEN USED A FEW TIMES. *TR

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 XL 100 JPS TRAILER WITH DURO TIRES, SIZE ST235 80 R16, DOT# X24M. WHILE THE CONTACT WAS EXAMINING HIS VEHICLE HE NOTICED TREAD WEAR AROUND THE SIDE WALL OF ALL FOUR TIRES. THE DEALER HAS NOT BEEN NOTIFIED. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 7000.            UPDATED 10/09/09 *CN  THE CONSUMER STATED WHILE TRAVELING BACK HOME, ANOTHER MOTORIST INFORMED HIM THAT ONE OF THE FIFTH WHEEL TIRES HAD BLOWN OUT. THE RIM AND THE FIFTH WHEEL WAS DAMAGED.  UPDATED 10/16/09
